languages.text: "Судя по орбитальным траекториям, эта звезда — родное светило данной системы. И, если люминочтец не лжет, когда-то оно было большим, злым и кусачим, а не этим полудохлым светляком".
"Judging by the orbital trajectories, this is the parent star of the system. If the lumenoreader is right, back in the day it used to be huge and angry with a bite to it, not this half-dead firefly."
languages.original_text: "Судя по орбитальным траекториям, эта звезда — родное светило данной системы. И, если люминочтец не лжет, когда-то оно было большим, злым и кусачим, а не этим полудохлым светляком".

traits.locale_text: "Judging by orbital trajectories, this is a parent star of the system. If the lumenoreader is telling the truth, back in the day it used to be big, angry, and stingy, not this half-dead firefly."
"Judging by orbital trajectories, this is a parent star of the system. If the lumenoreader is telling the truth, back in the day it used to be big, angry, and stingy, not this half-dead firefly."

"Judging by orbital trajectories, this is the parent star of the system. If the lumenoreader is telling the truth, back in the day it used to be huge and angry with a bite to it, not this half-dead firefly."

"Judging by orbital trajectories, this is the parent star of the system. If the lumenoreader is telling the truth, back in the day it used to be huge and angry with a bite to it, not this half-dead firefly."
"Judging by the orbital trajectories, this is the parent star of the system. If the lumenoreader is right, back in the day it used to be huge and angry with a bite to it, not this half-dead firefly."

languages.text: “根据轨道轨迹判断，这颗恒星是这个星系的母星。如果观星者说的是真的，那它曾经是一颗富有活力的巨型恒星。如果有谁冒犯了它，它肯定会勃然大怒，不会像现在这样，像一只濒死的萤火虫。”
languages.original_text: "Judging by the orbital trajectories, this is the parent star of the system. If the lumenoreader is right, back in the day it used to be huge and angry with a bite to it, not this half-dead firefly."

traits.locale_text: “根据轨道轨迹判断，这颗恒星是这个星系的母星。如果观星者说的是真的，那它曾经是一颗富有活力的巨型恒星。如果有谁冒犯了它，它肯定会勃然大怒，不会像现在这样，像一只濒死的萤火虫。”

languages.text: « Selon les trajectoires orbitales, il s'agit de l'étoile mère de ce système. Si l'on en croit le lumenomaître, c'était autrefois un astre gigantesque à la brillance féroce, pas cette luciole à moitié morte. »
languages.original_text: "Judging by the orbital trajectories, this is the parent star of the system. If the lumenoreader is right, back in the day it used to be huge and angry with a bite to it, not this half-dead firefly."

traits.locale_text: « Selon les trajectoires orbitales, il s'agit de l'étoile mère de ce système. Si l'on en croit le lumenomaître, c'était autrefois un astre gigantesque à la brillance féroce, pas cette luciole à moitié morte. »

languages.text: "Den orbitalen Flugbahnen nach zu urteilen ist das der Zentralstern des Systems. Wenn der Lumenoleser recht hat, war er einst riesig und extrem gefährlich, nicht so wie dieses halbtote Glühwürmchen."
languages.original_text: "Judging by the orbital trajectories, this is the parent star of the system. If the lumenoreader is right, back in the day it used to be huge and angry with a bite to it, not this half-dead firefly."

traits.locale_text: "Den orbitalen Flugbahnen nach zu urteilen ist das der Zentralstern des Systems. Wenn der Lumenoleser recht hat, war er einst riesig und extrem gefährlich, nicht so wie dieses halbtote Glühwürmchen."

"Den orbitalen Flugbahnen nach zu urteilen ist das der Zentralstern des Systems. Wenn der Lumenoleser die Wahrheit spricht, dann war er einst riesig groß und extrem gefährlich, nicht so wie dieses halbtote Glühwürmchen."

languages.text: «A juzgar por sus trayectorias orbitales, esta es la estrella madre del sistema. Si el fotometrista está en lo cierto, antaño era más grande y bastante más impresionante, no la luciérnaga moribunda en la que se ha convertido».
languages.original_text: "Judging by the orbital trajectories, this is the parent star of the system. If the lumenoreader is right, back in the day it used to be huge and angry with a bite to it, not this half-dead firefly."

traits.locale_text: «A juzgar por sus trayectorias orbitales, esta es la estrella madre del sistema. Si el fotometrista está en lo cierto, antaño era más grande y bastante más impresionante, no la luciérnaga moribunda en la que se ha convertido».

languages.text: 「軌道から判断すると、これがこの星系の親星だ。ルメノリーダーの読みが正しければ、かつては噛みつくような怒りを宿した巨大な星で、こんな半死半生のホタルのようではなかったはずだ」
languages.original_text: "Judging by the orbital trajectories, this is the parent star of the system. If the lumenoreader is right, back in the day it used to be huge and angry with a bite to it, not this half-dead firefly."

traits.locale_text: 「軌道から判断すると、これがこの星系の親星だ。ルメノリーダーの読みが正しければ、かつては噛みつくような怒りを宿した巨大な星で、こんな半死半生のホタルのようではなかったはずだ」

languages.text: "Yörüngedeki yol verilerine bakılırsa bu, sistemin ana yıldızı. Lümenölçer hatalı değilse eskiden devasa ve bir o kadar kızgınmış. Amma da dişliymiş, bu can çekişen ateş böceği hâllerinden eser yokmuş."
languages.original_text: "Judging by the orbital trajectories, this is the parent star of the system. If the lumenoreader is right, back in the day it used to be huge and angry with a bite to it, not this half-dead firefly."
